55 //list of items of the same type
56 template<typename type, int n_items> class ListTemplate : public List {
57 public:
58  ListTemplate(LinkedElement * parent = 0) : List(parent){}
59  Element * at(list_attr_size_t i){ return _items + i; }
60  list_attr_size_t size() const { return n_items; }
61  type * at_item(size_t i){ return _items + i; }
62 private:
63  type _items[n_items];
64 };
